channel.title: Matlab on Xiao-Le Deng (邓小乐)
channel.description: Recent content in Matlab on Xiao-Le Deng (邓小乐)

item.title: Matlab激活文件
item.description:
cd /usr/local/MATLAB/R2022b/bin

./activate_matlab.sh

参考

  • How do you run the Activation Client? - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central
  • How do I update my MATLAB license file for an Individual or Designated Computer license? - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central
  • How do I find my username in order to install or activate my license? - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central

item.title: Clear Linux删除Matlab
item.description:
rm -rf /usr/local/MATLAB/R2024b

rm /usr/local/bin/matlab /usr/local/bin/mcc /usr/local/bin/mex /usr/local/bin/mbuild

参考

  • How do I uninstall MATLAB or other MathWorks products on a Linux machine? - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central

item.title: Clear Linux的Matlab错误：Launching updater executable
item.description:
Clear Linux 系统命令行 Matlab 出现以下错误：

Launching updater executable
An unexpected error has occurred

解决方案：

  1. 关闭 Matlab

  2. 卸载删除MathWorks Service Host，终端输入：

killall MATLAB MathWorksServiceHost
rm -rf ~/.MathWorks/ServiceHost ~/.MATLABConnector
  1. 重新安装MathWorks Service Host，在 MATLAB Drive - MATLAB & Simulink 下载 Linux 版本并安装：
sudo chmod a+x *.bin
sudo ./*.bin

参考

  • How do I uninstall and reinstall the MathWorks Service Host? - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central
  • MATLAB Drive - MATLAB & Simulink
  • Updated Matlab keep trying to update - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central

item.title: Clear Linux安装Matlab
item.description:
# 运行 MATLAB 安装程序
unzip matlab_R2024b_glnxa64.zip -d matlab_installer

cd matlab_installer/bin/glnxa64
mkdir share
mv libX11.* ./share/

sudo ./install

cd /usr/local/MATLAB/R2024b/bin/glnxa64
sudo mkdir share
sudo mv libX11.* ./share/

cd /matlab_installer/bin/glnxa64
ldd ./MATLABWindow | grep libX11

显示：

libX11.so.6 => /usr/lib64/glibc-hwcaps/x86-64-v3/libX11.so.6.4.0 (0x00007f9f7f6f8000)

创建桌面启动文件：

vim ~/.local/share/applications/matlab.desktop

[Desktop Entry]
Name=MATLAB
Comment=MATLAB Application
Exec=/usr/local/MATLAB/R2024b/bin/matlab -desktop
Icon=/usr/local/MATLAB/R2024b/extern/icons/matlab_icon.png
Terminal=false
Type=Application
Categories=Development;Science;

参考

  • Matlab installation - General Discussion - Clear Linux OS Forum
  • ERROR: MATLAB is selecting SOFTWARE OPENGL rendering. - MATLAB Answers - MATLAB Central
  • How do I select hardware OpenGL rendering for MATLAB on Linux - Stack Overflow
  • 下载并安装 MATLAB
  • Why will MATLAB not start up properly on my Linux machine? - 帮助中心问答 - MATLAB & Simulink

item.title: Matlab的四精度(Quadruple Precision)
item.description:
MATLAB® 提供遵循 IEEE® 标准 754 的双精度 (double) 和单精度 (single) 浮点数数据类型。

如果数值范围约在 \( –3.4 \times 10^{38} \) 和 \( 3.4 \times 10^{38} \) 之间，您既可以用单精度，也可以用双精度来存储。如果数值超出该范围，请用双精度来存储。

实现 Matlab 四精度的工具有：

  • Symbolic Math Toolbox™ 2
  • Multiprecision Computing Toolbox for MATLAB 3, 4

延伸阅读

  1. 浮点数 - MATLAB & Simulink - MathWorks
  2. 高精度数值计算 - MATLAB & Simulink - MathWorks
  3. Multiprecision Computing Toolbox for MATLAB
  4. User’s Manual of Multiprecision Computing Toolbox for MATLAB

item.title: macOS系统安装m芯片的MATLAB R2022b测试版
item.description:
1. 步骤

  1. 先安装JAVA包，比如 Amazon Corretto 8 JDK，下载页面为：Downloads for Amazon Corretto 8，选 macOS aarch64。导入路径到环境变量，比如，在～/.zshrc加入export JAVA_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/amazon-corretto-8.jdk/Contents/Home。

  2. 下载 MATLAB_R2022b_Beta_install.dmg 包，并安装。因为是测试版，所以不需要激活，直接可以使用。

注意：This beta will be available until June 30, 2023.

2. 参考

  • Install MATLAB R2022b Native Apple Silicon Open Beta
  • Playing with the R2022b MATLAB Apple Silicon beta for M1/M2 Mac
  • Amazon Corretto 8 Installation Instructions for macOS 10.10 or later

item.title: Ubuntu installs Matlab2021b
item.description:
1. Steps

  1. Download the matlab_R2021b_glnxa64.zip at the matlab page https://ww2.mathworks.cn/licensecenter/licenses

  2. Unzip and install:

unzip matlab_R2021b_glnxa64.zip
cd matlab_R2021b_glnxa64/
./install

Note that the difference between sudo ./install (for root) and ./install (for current user).

When installing matlab, the paths are /home/deng/MATLAB/R2021b other than /usr/local/MATLAB/R2021b and /home/deng/bin other than /usr/local/bin.

  1. Add the command matlab into the file ~/.bashrc by:
gedit ~/.bashrc

alias matlab=\''/home/deng/bin/matlab'\'

source ~/.bashrc
  1. Add the Pin icon to Favorites:
cd ~/.local/share/applications
sudo gedit matlab.desktop

add the contents into matlab.desktop

item.title: Parameter Estimation and Inverse Problems
item.description:
1. Basic Information

  • ISBN: 978-0-12-804651-7
  • Language: English
  • Published: 2018
  • Copyright: Copyright © 2019 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
  • Imprint: Elsevier
  • No. of pages: 404

2. Table of Contents

  1. Preface to the Third Edition
  2. Chapter One - Introduction
  3. Chapter Two - Linear Regression
  4. Chapter Three - Rank Deficiency and Ill-Conditioning
  5. Chapter Four - Tikhonov Regularization
  6. Chapter Five - Discretizing Inverse Problems Using Basis Functions
  7. Chapter Six - Iterative Methods
  8. Chapter Seven - Sparsity Regularization and Total Variation Techniques
  9. Chapter Eight - Fourier Techniques
  10. Chapter Nine - Nonlinear Regression
  11. Chapter Ten - Nonlinear Inverse Problems
  12. Chapter Eleven - Bayesian Methods
  13. Chapter Twelve - Epilogue
  14. Appendix A - Review of Linear Algebra
  15. Appendix B - Review of Probability and Statistics
  16. Appendix C - Review of Vector Calculus
  17. Appendix D - Glossary of Notation
  18. Bibliography
  19. Index

3. Codes

brianborchers/PEIP: MATLAB code for examples and exercises for the 3rd edition of Parameter Estimation and Inverse Problems

item.title: Geophysical Data Analysis - Discrete Inverse Theory
item.description:
1. Basic Information

  • Title: Geophysical Data Analysis - Discrete Inverse Theory 4th Edition
  • Authors: William Menke
  • ISBN - Paperback: 978-0-12-813555-6
  • ISBN - eBook: 978-0-12-813556-3
  • Imprint: Academic Press
  • Published Date: 12th April 2018
  • Page Count: 352

2. Table of Contents

  1. Describing Inverse Problems
  2. Some Comments on Probability Theory
  3. Solution of the Linear, Gaussian Inverse Problem, Viewpoint 1: The Length Method
  4. Solution of the Linear, Gaussian Inverse Problem, Viewpoint 2: Generalized Inverses
  5. Solution of the Linear, Gaussian Inverse Problem, Viewpoint 3: Maximum Likelihood Methods
  6. Nonuniqueness and Localized Averages
  7. Applications of Vector Spaces
  8. Linear Inverse Problems and Non-Gaussian Statistics
  9. Nonlinear Inverse Problems
  10. Factor Analysis
  11. Continuous Inverse Theory and Tomography
  12. Sample Inverse Problems
  13. Applications of Inverse Theory to Solid Earth Geophysics

3. Codes

MATLAB codes - Geophysical Data Analysis - Discrete Inverse Theory

item.title: GTeC: Gravity Terrain Correction
item.description:
1. Introduction

A versatile MATLAB® tool for a detailed computation of the terrain correction and Bouguer gravity anomalies.

2. Reference

item.title: SHADE: Spherical HArmonic coefficient empirical DE-correlation
item.description:

Download: SHADE

2. References

item.title: SRBF_package: spherical radial basis functions
item.description:
1. Introduction

SRBF_package is a collection of a few routines for gravity field modelling with band-limited spherical radial basis functions (SRBFs), allowing both analysis and synthesis of the gravitational field.

Website:

  • Bucha/#SRBF_package
  • http://edisk.cvt.stuba.sk/~xbuchab/SRBF_package/SRBF_package.zip

2. Reference

Bucha, B., Janák, J., Papčo, J., Bezděk, A., 2016. High-resolution regional gravity field modelling in a mountainous area from terrestrial gravity data. Geophysical Journal International. 207, 949-966. http://doi.org/10.1093/gji/ggw311

item.title: SHA_SHS: spherical harmonic analysis and synthesis
item.description:
1. Introduction

Download:

  • Bucha/#SHA
  • http://edisk.cvt.stuba.sk/~xbuchab/SHA_code/SHA_SHS.zip

2. Reference

Bucha, B., Hirt, C., Kuhn, M., 2019. Cap integration in spectral gravity forward modelling up to the full gravity tensor. Journal of Geodesy. https://doi.org/10.1007/s00190-019-01277-3

item.title: isGrafLab: Irregular Surface GRAvity Field LABoratory
item.description:
1. Introduction

isGrafLab (Irregular Surface GRAvity Field LABoratory) is a modified version of GrafLab that allows accurate and fast computation of functionals of the geopotential at dense grids on irregular surfaces such as the Earth's surface.

Download: Downloads - Faculty of Civil Engineering in Bratislava

Others:

  • Bucha/#isGrafLab
  • Definition of functionals of the geopotential used in GrafLab software

2. Reference

Bucha, B., Janák, J. (2014). A MATLAB-based graphical user interface program for computing functionals of the geopotential up to ultra-high degrees and orders: Efficient computation at irregular surfaces. Computers & Geosciences 66, 219-227. http://doi.org/10.1016/j.cageo.2014.02.005.

item.title: GrafLab: GRAvity Field LABoratory
item.description:
1. Introduction

GrafLab (GRAvity Field LABoratory) is a MATLAB-based routine for computing functionals of the geopotential up to ultra-high degrees and orders (tens of thousands and beyond).

Download: Downloads - Faculty of Civil Engineering in Bratislava

Others:

  • Bucha/#GrafLab
  • Definition of functionals of the geopotential used in GrafLab software

2. Reference

Bucha, B., Janák, J. (2013). A MATLAB-based graphical user interface program for computing functionals of the geopotential up to ultra-high degrees and orders. Computers & Geosciences 56, 186-196. http://doi.org/10.1016/j.cageo.2013.03.012

item.title: GravPSO2D: 2D gravity inversion using the Particle Swarm Optimization
item.description:
1. Introduction

A Matlab Package for the 2D gravity inversion in sedimentary basins is presented.

2. Reference

GravPSO2D: A Matlab package for 2D gravity inversion in sedimentary basins using the Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm. Computers & Geosciences. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cageo.2020.104653

item.title: Matlab命名注意事项
item.description:
Matlab命名有一定的技巧，以后应多多注意。

  • Matlab的命名对字母的大小写敏感，如myname和MyName为两个变量；
  • 变量名的第一个字符必须是英文名，最多63个字符；
  • 变量名不得包含空格、标点、运算符，但可以包含下划线，如 My_Name_213；
  • 用户自定义变量名：不与关键字同名，检验命令为iskeyword UserName或exist UserName

Reference

  • 精通MATLAB R2011a

item.title: 日结—MATLAB算法
item.description:
今天，借了一本书：《Matlab智能算法30个案例分析》。

正如同书的扉页所说的：对于这些算法我们的学习态度应该是怎么样的？如果我们只是用这些算法来解决实际问题，只是想用这些算法尝试下常规算法难以准确求解的问题，对于这些复杂的理论，我们可以简单研究，了解算法中最精髓的几个概念，以及算法模型的抽象方法皆可。

更应该把时间放在如何从实际待求解问题中抽象出适合算法求解的模型上，甚至是如何利用与借鉴别人的方法和经验来解决自己的问题。
